full_summary:
**Business Analyst (Senior) Contract Notice**
---------------

###  Notice Information

* ** solicitation number:** W0152-23-AA008
* **publication date:** August 31, 2022
* **tender closing date:** September 15, 2022
* **tender status:** Expired

### Background Information
This business analyst senior contract is part of the Department of National Defence (DND) requirement for Task Based Professional Services (TSPS), specifically one (1) Business Analyst (Level 3) for the duration of the contract. The estimated level of effort is 120 days, plus 120 days in the optional period, with the possibility of two six (6) month option periods.

### Eligibility
This requirement is open to eight (8) pre-qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under E60ZT-18TSPS, who qualified under Tier 1 for category 2.1, Business Analyst (Senior).

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence, located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada. The procurement contact is Wallace, Caleb, who can be reached at ARMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca.

### Solicitation Documents
The solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and the vendor information package (VIP), can be found on the Government of Canada Tendering Website.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for this procurement include, but are not limited to, the following: technical expertise, experience, methodology, pricing, and terms and conditions.

### Optional Information
Soliciting parties can contact the Contracting Authority for more information or to discuss any questions or concerns they may have. Additionally, a "Qualified SA Holder" listing can be obtained by contacting the Procurement Services Branch. Moreover, a Literature Control Reference (LCR) number is under Common Security Classification (SRCL) #19.

Attachments
----------

* [W0152-23-AA008.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/31/5db88d0e
